question: Is it permissible to use the following hair dye :Color me Natural Hair Dye Dark Brown color...
answer:
QUESTION

Is it permissible to use the following hair dye :Color me Natural Hair Dye Dark Brown color

Ingredients: Indigofera tinctoria, Lawsonia inermis alba, Emblica officinalis, Eclipta alba, Acacia cathechu

Website: http://www.aubreyorganicsuk.co.uk/product-54-colour-me-natural-hair-dye-dark-brown.html
& http://www.ecohip.org/product.php/1605/hair-color---color-me-natural-dark-brown/ccba1d4133c2bdc79662e23b44794a38

ANSWER


Share:

In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful  


Assalaamu `alaykum waRahmatullahi Wabarakatuh

 

We have studied the ingredients mentioned in your query and the links provided by you. We do not see anything wrong with the ingredients of the mentioned hair dye.       

 

(Fatawa Mahmoodiya, 19/ 454-457, Farooqiyah)

 ( اختضب لأجل التزين للنساء والجواري جاز ) في الأصح ويكره بالسواد وقيل لا
قال ابن عابدين في شرحه:
ومذهبنا استحباب خضاب الشيب للرجل والمرأة بصفرة أو حمرة وتحريم خضابه بالسواد على الأصح لقوله عليه الصلاة والسلام { غيروا هذا الشيب واجتنبوا السواد }
(ردالمحتار، 6/ 756، سعيد)

 

And Allah knows best

Wassalaamu `alaykum
